img_summary: The image depicts the "Copper Pill," an Epic-tier item from the video game *Black Myth: Wukong*. This item provides the effect of making the next "Rock Solid" cast cost no mana for a short duration after using the gourd. It is found by a statue on the hill after the Tiger Vanguard fight at the Crouching Tiger Temple - Temple Entrance in Yellow Wind Ridge. The image serves as a visual reference for players to identify the item in the game.
